name: CockBlocker I
description:
THIS GAME IS INTENDED FOR ADULTS ONLY. Must be 18+ to play.

Welcome to CockBlocker, an Adult Breakout-like Stripping game.

BACKGROUND

You live under an oppressive regime that has outlawed sexiness. That means no sexting, no flirting and definitely no sex. But you, the ever industrious hacker, have created an app to unblock this sexiness, at least digitally. 

Break your way through 7 challenging levels as you unlock a sexy striptease.

Full version includes: 

  • Volume Controls
  • Image Viewer Gallery
  • Save Data

MacOS version COMING SOON.

CONTROLS

Mouse Movement - Control the paddle

Left Click - Release ball

Spacebar - Open Pause Menu

CREDITS

Art - Saffice

Music - Pinecones by Wontolla

Gameplay - Jedd Midnight

Typeface - Philosophy by Mr Letters
